root_miner.title: Path of the Digger
root_miner.description:
§8Plough through hordes of... blocks, with your trusty... shovel? Look the game's name is MINEcraft so I had to fit this in somewhere.
Follow this path to become more proficient with axes, pickaxes, and shovels! 

§aGet experience in this tree by mining blocks!

axe.title: Axeman
axe.description:
§8A wise man once said: " Now look here son, when you hear the tree creak, don't stand undern-" 

§a+10% Efficiency with Axes

pickaxe.title: Pick-axe
pickaxe.description:
§8...or pick something else, vary it up a little, you know?

§a+5% Efficiency with pickaxes

shovel.title: Surface Digger
shovel.description:
§8You feel capable of so much more than digging dirt, and yet here you are. 

§a+10% Efficiency with shovels

shovel-2.title: Shovel Knight
shovel-2.description:
§8Who knew a knight with a shovel could fight so well?

§a+30% Shovel Efficiency,

§c-20% pickaxe efficiency

axe-2.title: Axed
axe-2.description:
§8Who knew body spray could be so sharp? 

§a+30% Axe Efficiency,

§c-20% pickaxe efficiency

pickaxe-2.title: Pickaxe Rick
pickaxe-2.description:
§8It's a pickaxe, Rick! (I hate that show but I do what I gotta do to resonate with my audience)

§a+20% Efficiency with pickaxes,

§c-40% axe efficiency

§c-40% shovel efficiency

repair.title: Repairman
repair.description:
§8Minecraft repair prices, brought to you by Goldman Sachs. 

§a-10% Repair Prices

fire-immune.title: Hephaestus
fire-immune.description:
§8The greek god of fire, and let's face it, a better name for Tinker's Construct.

§aImmunity to all fire damage

§cDamage over time while in contact with water

fire-power.title: Raging Fire
fire-power.description:
§8What doesn't burn you makes you stronger.

§aYou deal bonus damage when on fire

stone-killer.title: Stone Killer
stone-killer.description:
§8You can break stone with your BARE HANDS. Ouch.

§aYou can break stone with your bare hands (and then actually get the stone)
